title: Tiri Monastery
about: Tiri Monastery is located in Shida Kartli Region, Gori Municipality, 8 km away from Tskhinvali. The monument is currently on the territory which is occupied by Russia. The complex includes several buildings: the Church of the Nativity of the Virgin Mary, the refectory, the bell tower, the fence and the caves. The earliest of the buildings is the church of the nativity of the virgin mary, which dates back to the XIII century.
